summary: Consume Cockpit API to perform operations on collections, forms, and singletons.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Specifies the type of resource to operate on (collection, form, singleton).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Specifies the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Name of the collection to operate on.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results to return.
